remarks: Lemma for ~ axsegcon .  Show that the distance between two distinct points is positive.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Sep-2013.)
statement:
axsegconlem2.1 $e |- S = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( A ` p ) - ( B ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem6 $p |- ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A =/= B ) -> 0 < ( sqrt ` S ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d N p $.
